body_html:
It will be very helpful to have a small repro case.

CPU and GPU are known to produce slightly different results. For each operation, if the inputs are identical, the output should only have lsb difference. So if you observe large difference from a single operation, not a sequence of operations, it might be a bug somewhere. Otherwise, this is somewhat expected.

body:
It will be very helpful to have a small repro case.

CPU and GPU are known to produce slightly different results. For each operation, if the inputs are identical, the output should only have lsb difference. So if you observe large difference from a single operation, not a sequence of operations, it might be a bug somewhere. Otherwise, this is somewhat expected.
